name: mopDrying_start
description: This function is used to start the mop drying function of the robot vacuum cleaner.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to start the mop drying function.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of the device to start the mop drying function.
